item.title: [PI]Solitude Donator cape gives x2 xp help[PI]
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

Sorry for the bump…

But I think I figured out the fix, just recently. And decided to come back here. I don’t know if you still want this or not.

In PlayerAssistant.java search for the following

public boolean addSkillXP(int amount, int skill){

Add this in there

if (c.isDonator == 1 && c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape] == itemId) { amount *= Config.SERVER_EXP_BONUS * 2; } else { amount *= Config.SERVER_EXP_BONUS; }

Read full topic

Before this

Put that

Put that

if(c.isDonator == 0) for(int i : donItems) if(wearID == i) { c.sendMessage("You must be a donator to wear this item."); return false; }

item.title: [PI]Solitude Donator cape gives x2 xp help[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Quackie Quackie
item.description:
@Quackie wrote:

                      |

No errors is in this. V

  1. FIXED
  2. FIXED
  3. Didnt work.
  4. Didnt work (Now its not even saying that you need donor to wear it.)

CODES:
3: public boolean donatorcape() { if(playerEquipment[playerCape] == 12742); { Config.SERVER_EXP_BONUS *= 2; } return false; }

4:if ((12742 == 12742) && (c.isDonator != 1)) { if(c.isDonator !=0 ){ c.sendMessage("This is a donator only item."); } }
Anyone any ideas?

Read full topic
item.source: [PI]Solitude Donator cape gives x2 xp help[PI]

item.title: [PI]Solitude Donator cape gives x2 xp help[PI]
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("master")) { for (int i = 0; i < 25; i++) { c.playerLevel[i] = 99; c.playerXP[i] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(100); c.getPA().refreshSkill(i); } c.getPA().requestUpdates(); }

In commands.java put this under public void administratorCommands(Client c, String playerCommand)
or something like that

  1. Same as number 1.

  2. Replace “itemid” with the itemid.

Try this and see.

if(c.playerEquipment[cape] == itemid) { Config.SERVER_EXP_BONUS = 2; }

Also, in your Config class, find:

public static final double SERVER_EXP_BONUS = 1;

and change it to:

public static double SERVER_EXP_BONUS = 1;

^ you may need that you may not.

Itemassistant.java

if ((wearID == itemid) && (c.isDonator != 1)) { c.sendMessage("This is a donator only item."); return false; }

Your welcome.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Solitude Donator cape gives x2 xp help[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Quackie Quackie
item.description:
@Quackie wrote:

Source: Solitude.

I wnat to make is so Donator cape gives 2x xp

DIf you know how to fix this please tell me or send me a link to some guide or something. I have been trying to find help but i cant.
If you want to talk about the server, maybe some info or just want to help me, add me on skype: pow_of_skill Name: Call me burn.

I want to make so the Donator cape (Fully wear-able) x2 the xp when worn. The code for it is:

public boolean donatorcape() { if(playerEquipment[playerCape] == 12742); { Config.SERVER_EXP_BONUS = 2; } return false; }
